tool_description: A collection of popular Australian News providers and their articles.
name: AUS News
title: AUS News

api_list.name: Article
Provider topics articles
api_list.description: Returns a list of articles specific to the topic
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aus-news.p.rapidapi.com/providers/100/102"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aus-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://aus-news.p.rapidapi.com/providers/{providerid}/{topicid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aus-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
